entry.title: ‘Almost All Pyramid Schemes’ In Russia Are Crypto Related, Central Bank Says
entry.summary: The Central Bank of Russia counted 5,735 financial scams and 2,944 pyramid schemes in 2023, up big time from the year before.

entry.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Preview: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: UPDATED: The Nintendo Switch 2 will reportedly play Switch games with enhancements—and the hardware reveal may be right around the corner.

entry.title: Real-World Pokédex Can ID Pokémon On Sight, Thanks to ChatGPT
entry.summary: An ex-Google engineer-turned-YouTuber brings Pokémon nostalgia to life with a 3D-printed, AI-powered Pokédex that identifies the creatures.

entry.title: Coinbase, Ripple-Backed Super PAC Spends Millions to Defeat Elizabeth Warren Ally
entry.summary: With an $85 million war chest, Fairshake PAC initiated an ad blitz in California this week targeted at U.S. Senate candidate Katie Porter.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF 'FOMO Rally' Could Send Price to All-Time High: Bernstein
entry.summary: In a note to clients, Alliance Bernstein analysts make a bullish case for Bitcoin's price hitting new highs later this year.

entry.title: Glenlivet Distillery Mixes Ethereum NFTs and AI Into Whiskey Collection
entry.summary: NFTs, AI, and luxury liquor—what’s not to love?

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Surpass $3 Billion Net Flows, Shattering Gold ETF Launch
entry.summary: Spot Bitcoin ETFs have surged past the historical performance of gold ETFs, and the new funds have swelled by $450 million a day already this week.

entry.title: You Can Now Earn Crypto by Playing Solana Game 'Aurory' on Epic Games Store
entry.summary: Aurory’s Seekers of Tokane game is now open to the public on the Epic Games Store, but only for a limited time.

entry.title: Bitcoin Back Below $50,000 After Inflation Data Spooks Investors
entry.summary: The higher-than-expected inflation in January dashes hopes that the Federal Reserve will lower interest rates any time soon.

entry.title: Ledger Users Can Now Buy Assets From Coinbase—Without First Transferring Assets Out of Their Wallet
entry.summary: The integration means Ledger Live users can purchase assets from Coinbase without first having to transfer crypto off their hardware wallet.

entry.title: Bitcoin Betting Site Thunderpick Reveals $1 Million 'Counter-Strike 2' Competition
entry.summary: Following last year’s $600,000 Bitcoin prize pool, Thunderpick is nearly doubling the pot for this year’s Counter-Strike 2 competition.

entry.title: BONK, PEPE and Dogwifhat Leading Meme Coin Rally
entry.summary: Guess which meme coin just got an unexpected boost from LA Lakers' LeBron James.

entry.title: Is That Joe Biden or an AI Deepfake? White House Plans to Tag Authentic Content
entry.summary: The Biden administration says it will use watermarking and cryptography technology developed with the AI Safety Institute to fight political disinformation.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Keeps Its $50,000 Foothold, Putting Virtually Everyone In the Money
entry.summary: The Bitcoin market cap is roughly three times the size of Ethereum's—a distinction BTC only recently re-established in October 2023.

entry.title: Gaming Blockchain Oasys Links With Korean Firm, Driving OAS To All-Time High
entry.summary: Action and strategy RPGs "The Walking Dead: All-Stars" and "Summoners War: Chronicles" will move to the layer-2 chain.

entry.title: CZ Sentencing Postponed Until End of April: Report
entry.summary: Changpeng Zhao's sentencing for money laundering was pushed back two months without explanation from the federal court.

entry.summary: Before PIXEL drops, founder Luke Barwikowski speaks with Decrypt’s GG about the long road to building a crypto gaming sensation.

entry.summary: Luke Barwikowski, founder of farming game Pixels on Ronin, joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the incoming launch of the PIXEL token and why he sees it as such a turning point for the rising blockchain game.

entry.summary: Did Joe Biden rig the Super Bowl? Did he pump Bitcoin to $50K? Should we seriously be writing about this? All important questions.

entry.summary: The top financial firm is the latest major player to seek approval to offer investors a taste of Ethereum.

entry.summary: Pandora, an Ethereum token and NFT hybrid using an experimental ERC-404 standard, is bouncing back—but there's new "semi-fungible" competition.

entry.summary: Investors are clearly interested in putting money in funds that offer exposure to BTC, and its price reflects that.

entry.summary: We put the two top-shelf chatbots from two tech titans to the test. Digging into the details is worth more than a thousand words.

entry.summary: Pudgy Penguins have surged in value to recent months while Bored Apes are down sharply from their all-time high. Is a "flippening" imminent?

entry.summary: Yat Siu, CEO and co-founder of Animoca Brands, joins the FOMO Hour to discuss his view of the Web3 gaming space, how 2024 is already shaping up to be a big year for crypto gaming, the importance of education in the Web3 space, and much, much more.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Issuers May Dwindle by End of Year, Says Valkyrie CIO
entry.summary: With such fierce competition in the field, Valkyrie’s CIO Steve McClurg predicts that not everyone will be left standing by next year.

entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Benjamin White digs into the rise of Farcaster, the decentralized social media platform that's challenging Twitter following the launch of its Frames feature. Is this the decentralized social media app that finally clicks with the masses?

entry.title: Why Gmoney Took Out a $1 Million Loan on a CryptoPunks NFT
entry.summary: Pseudonymous NFT collector and entrepreneur Gmoney joined Rug Radio's live "FOMO Hour" show to discuss why he took out a $1 million loan on one of the most recognizable CryptoPunks NFTs around.

entry.title: Solana Hunger Games: Explained in One Minute or Less
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains the latest sensation taking over timelines on Crypto Twitter, Solana Hunger Games. The new "crypto AR" game from GG.zip is backed by Delphi and plans to launch in the spring. Here's what going on, explained in one minute or less.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Gala Marija Vrbanic
entry.summary:
Tribute Brand founder and CEO Gala Marija Vrbanic joins 5 Questions With SCENE to discuss not just fashion, but graffiti crimes, fishless aquariums, and the apparently emergent sport of wind chasing.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Why Is Everyone Talking About Jupiter on Solana?
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains why the crypto world can't stop talking about Solana's Jupiter. What is JUP? Who qualified for the airdrop? And will there be another round?

entry.title: Jupiter Founder Meow Unloads on the Solana Airdrop 'FUD'
entry.summary: Meow, the pseudonymous founder of Solana DEX aggregator Jupiter, made a surprise appearance today on Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to address the JUP airdrop "FUD," and explain why he believes the backlash to the team's launch liquidity pool is unfounded.

entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Jason from Holograph.xyz
They dive into the multichain future and what that means for NFTs, DeFi, RWAs, and more.

entry.title: How Generative AI Makes for a More Inclusive Metaverse in 'Avalon'
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson about the use of generative AI within the upcoming game and how it will help players from anywhere and everywhere truly see themselves represented in the online world.

entry.title: How a Perfume DAO Crafted a 'Scent of the Metaverse'
entry.summary: Rook Perfumes founder Nadeem Crowe and Melissa Gilmour of Web3 creative agency Lily & Piper join Stephen Graves to talk about how they created a fragrance with a DAO and brought it to the shelves of London department store Harvey Nichols.

entry.title: Trash-Fueled BTC Mining w/ Chris Bennet
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Chris Bennet from Spacestation Investments.
They discuss: - Mining BTC with energy generated from landfills - How to increase deal-flow - Running an agency vs running a fund

entry.title: Preview of Agoria's 'Le Code d’Orsay'
entry.summary: A first look at "Sigma Lumina," a sculpture by artist and musician Agoria in collaboration with Johan Lescure. It features in "Le Code d’Orsay," the first NFT exhibition at the Musée d’Orsay.

entry.title: Are you the one being farmed? w/ Frisson
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Frisson from Tallyx.xyz
They reflect on: - building in the bear market - the points system meta - will zoomers care about decentralization

entry.title: 'Look Touch Own': OONA Discusses Her Performance Art Exhibition
entry.summary: Conceptual artist OONA joins moderator Raina Marie to discuss "Look Touch Own," her performance art exhibition featuring her own former breast implants, which have been tokenized. This conversation was recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Genius Marketing by Genius Marketers: How Crypto Builders Can Reach the Masses
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh Sarmad moderates a conversation between 9dcc founder and CEO Gmoney and Serotonin founder and CEO Amanda Cassatt about the challenges and opportunities in Web3 marketing and how they're navigating the ever-evolving space. Recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.
